Notes: The collection now has over 1200 vintage and modern motorcycles as well as a substantial collection of Lotus and other racecars.  The Barber Vintage Museum Library began as a research tool to aid in the creation and restoration of the motorcycle collectioN The bulk of the information in the library ties to bikes that are in the collection. The library has become one of the largest collections of motorcycle literature in the world, containing more than 6000 books as well as back issues of over 50 different motorcycle magazines, parts catalogs, service manuals, photographs, and over 700 video titles.
Source of Repository Data: Alabama Department of Archives and History
